summary.span: 为 Web 和应用程序服务管理 ASP.NET Ajax 脚本库和脚本文件、局部页面呈现以及客户端代理类生成。

span.span: Manages ASP.NET Ajax script libraries and script files, partial-page rendering, and client proxy class generation for Web and application services.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [在局部页面呈现Partial-Page Rendering](#partial_page_rendering) - [使用母版页、 用户控件和其他子组件使用 ScriptManager 控件Using the ScriptManager Control with Master Pages, User Controls, and Other Child Components](#using_the_scriptmanager_control_with_master_pages__user_controls__and_other_child_components) - [脚本管理和注册Script Management and Registration](#script_management_and_registration) - [Web 服务引用Web Service References](#web_service_references) - [本地化Localization](#localization) - [错误处理Error Handling](#error_handling) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是 ASP.NET 中 Ajax 功能的核心。The control is central to Ajax functionality in ASP.NET. 该控件管理页上的所有 ASP.NET Ajax 资源。The control manages all ASP.NET Ajax resources on a page. 这包括 Microsoft Ajax 库脚本下载到浏览器和协调通过启用部分页更新控件。This includes downloading Microsoft Ajax Library scripts to the browser and coordinating partial-page updates that are enabled by using controls. 此外，控件，可以执行以下操作：In addition, the control enables you to do the following: - 注册适用于部分页更新的脚本。Register script that is compatible with partial-page updates. 为了管理您的脚本核心库之间的依赖关系，您注册任何脚本加载 Microsoft Ajax Library 脚本之后。In order to manage dependencies between your script and the core library, any script that you register is loaded after the Microsoft Ajax Library script. - 指定是否发布或调试脚本发送到浏览器。Specify whether release or debug scripts are sent to the browser. - 提供对访问 Web 服务方法从脚本通过注册 Web 服务与控件。Provide access to Web service methods from script by registering Web services with the control. - 通过注册这些服务用于从客户端脚本的应用程序服务提供对 ASP.NET 身份验证、 角色和配置文件访问控件。Provide access to ASP.NET authentication, role, and profile application services from client script by registering these services with the control. - 启用特定于区域性的 ECMAScript (JavaScript)、、 和函数在浏览器中的显示。Enable culture-specific display of ECMAScript (JavaScript) , , and functions in the browser. - 通过使用访问本地化资源为嵌入的脚本文件或独立的脚本文件属性的控件。Access localization resources for embedded script files or for stand-alone script files by using the property of the control. - 注册实现的服务器控件或与控件，以便呈现所需的客户端组件和行为的脚本。Register server controls that implement the or interfaces with the control so that script required by client components and behaviors is rendered. ## 在局部页面呈现Partial-Page Rendering ASP.NET 页面的支持局部页面呈现的功能受以下因素：The ability of an ASP.NET page to support partial-page rendering is controlled by the following factors: - 控件的属性必须为`true`（默认值）。The control's property must be `true` (the default value). - 必须有至少一个页上的控件。There must be at least one control on the page. - 属性必须为`true`（默认值）。The property must be `true` (the default value). 如果未显式设置属性，其值基于浏览器功能。If the property is not set explicitly, its value is based on browser capabilities. 可以重写的值属性在运行时期间或之前的页事件。You can override the value of the property at run time during or before the page's event. 如果尝试将此属性更改后的页事件已发生的引发异常。If you try to change this property after the page's event has occurred, an exception is thrown. 如果支持局部页面呈现，控件呈现脚本以启用异步回发和部分页面更新。When partial-page rendering is supported, the control renders script to enable asynchronous postbacks and partial-page updates. 要更新的页的区域被指定使用控件。The regions of the page to be updated are designated by using controls. 控制处理异步回发和刷新仅的区域的页的更新。The control handles the asynchronous postbacks and refreshes only the regions of the page that have to be updated. 有关在局部页面呈现的详细信息，请参阅[局部页面呈现概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about partial-page rendering, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 有关导致更新的条件的详细信息，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)。For more information about the conditions that cause an update, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a). ## 使用母版页、 用户控件和其他子组件使用 ScriptManager 控件Using the ScriptManager Control with Master Pages, User Controls, and Other Child Components 一个页只能包含一个其层次结构中的控件。A page can contain only one control in its hierarchy. 当父页面已具有注册服务和嵌套的页面、 用户控件或组件的脚本控制，请使用控件。To register services and scripts for nested pages, user controls, or components when the parent page already has a control, use the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用母版页使用 UpdatePanel 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b1c974d5-a6b2-4bb3-a3cc-61dd9dc0e1d6)For more information, see [Using the UpdatePanel Control with Master Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b1c974d5-a6b2-4bb3-a3cc-61dd9dc0e1d6) ## 脚本管理和注册Script Management and Registration 控件使你能够注册脚本，然后呈现为页的一部分。The control enables you to register script that is then rendered as part of the page. 控件注册方法可以分为以下三个类别：The control registration methods can be broken into the following three categories: - 保证 Microsoft Ajax Library 上的脚本依赖项将保留的注册方法。Registration methods that guarantee that script dependencies on the Microsoft Ajax Library are maintained. - 注册方法不依赖于 Microsoft Ajax 库中，但与兼容控件。Registration methods that are not dependent on the Microsoft Ajax Library, but that are compatible with controls. - 注册方法，支持使用控件。Registration methods that support working with controls. 有关如何创建和使用 ASP.NET Ajax 脚本的详细信息，请参阅[创建自定义客户端脚本中通过使用 Microsoft Ajax Library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/285e3a65-b42e-42c5-952d-baf184057899)。For more information about how to create and use Ajax script in ASP.NET, see [Creating Custom Client Script by Using the Microsoft Ajax Library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/285e3a65-b42e-42c5-952d-baf184057899). ### 注册依赖于 Microsoft Ajax 库的脚本Registering Script That Is Dependent on the Microsoft Ajax Library 可以使用以下方法来保证 Microsoft Ajax Library 上的任何依赖项是一种方法中注册脚本文件。You can use the following methods to register script files in a way that guarantees that any dependencies on the Microsoft Ajax Library are maintained. |方法Method|定义Definition| |------------|----------------| ||将服务器控件实现注册用于定义客户端对象的接口。Registers a server control that implements the interface that is used to define a client object. 控件呈现支持客户端对象的脚本。The control renders script that supports the client object.| ||将服务器控件实现注册用于定义客户端对象的接口。Registers a server control that implements the interface that is used to define a client object. 控件呈现支持客户端对象的脚本。The control renders script that supports the client object.| ### 注册部分页面更新兼容脚本Registering Partial-Page Update Compatible Scripts 可以使用以下方法来注册脚本文件不依赖于 Microsoft Ajax Library 但与兼容控件。You can use the following methods to register script files that are not dependent on the Microsoft Ajax Library but that are compatible with controls. 这些方法对应于的类似方法控件。These methods correspond to similar methods of the control. 如果您是在内部使用的呈现脚本控件，请确保调用的方法控件。If you are rendering script for use inside an control, make sure that you call the methods of the control. |方法Method|定义Definition| |------------|----------------| ||将值添加到 JavaScript 数组。Adds a value to a JavaScript array. 如果数组不存在，则创建它。If the array does not exist, it is created.| ||呈现`script`元素的页打开之后`
`标记。Renders a `script` element after the page's opening `` tag. 该脚本指定为字符串参数。The script is specified as a string parameter.| ||呈现`script`元素的页打开之后``标记。Renders a `script` element after the page's opening `` tag. 通过设置指定的脚本内容`src`属性指向脚本文件的 URL。The script content is specified by setting the `src` attribute to a URL that points to a script file.| ||呈现`script`元素的页打开之后``标记。Renders a `script` element after the page's opening `` tag. 使用资源名称的程序集中指定脚本内容。The script content is specified with a resource name in an assembly. `src`属性会自动填充的 URL 的 HTTP 处理程序从程序集中检索的已命名的脚本调用。The `src` attribute is automatically populated with a URL by a call to an HTTP handler that retrieves the named script from the assembly.| ||呈现指定控件的标记中的自定义名称/值特性对 (expando)。Renders a custom name/value attribute pair (an expando) in the markup for a specified control.| ||呈现隐藏的字段。Renders a hidden field.| ||注册响应执行的脚本`form`元素的`submit`事件。Registers a script that is executed in response to the `form` element's `submit` event. `onSubmit`属性引用指定的脚本。The `onSubmit` attribute references the specified script.| ||呈现页面的关闭之前只是一个启动脚本块``标记。Renders a startup script block just before the page's closing `` tag. 要呈现的脚本指定为字符串参数。The script to render is specified as a string parameter.| 注册方法时，您可以指定该脚本的类型/密钥对。When you register methods, you specify a type/key pair for that script. 如果已注册具有相同的类型/密钥对的脚本，未注册一个新的脚本。If a script with the same type/key pair is already registered, a new script is not registered. 同样，如果已注册的脚本的类型中的资源名称对存在，`script`元素引用的资源不会再次添加。Similarly, if you register a script with a type/resource name pair that already exists, the `script` element that references the resource is not added again. 注册以前注册的属性的 expando 属性时，将引发异常。When you register an expando attribute of a previously registered attribute, an exception is thrown. 允许的数组值重复的注册。Duplicate registration of array values is allowed. 当您调用或方法，避免注册执行内联函数的脚本。When you call the or the method, avoid registering script that executes inline functions. 相反，注册包含函数定义，如事件处理程序或你的应用程序的自定义类定义的脚本。Instead, register script that contains function definitions like event handlers or custom class definitions for your application. ### UpdatePanel 控件的注册方法Registration Methods for UpdatePanel Controls 可以使用以下方法使用时，自定义部分页面更新控件。You can use the following methods to customize partial-page updates when you use controls. |方法Method|定义Definition| |------------|----------------| ||将控件注册为异步回发的触发器。Registers a control as a trigger for asynchronous postbacks.| ||在局部页面呈现期间将自定义数据发送到多个控件。Sends custom data to controls during partial-page rendering.| ||注册控件内部的释放脚本控件。Registers a dispose script for a control that is inside an control. 在更新或删除 控件时会执行脚本。The script is executed when the control is updated or deleted. Dispose 方法用于对客户端组件是 Microsoft Ajax 库的一部分，且必须在不再使用某个组件时释放资源。The dispose method is used for client components that are part of the Microsoft Ajax Library and that have to free resources when a component is no longer used.| ||将控件注册为完全回发的触发器。Registers a control as a trigger for a full postback. 此方法用于内部控件将执行异步回发的控件。This method is used for controls inside an control that would otherwise perform asynchronous postbacks.| ## Web 服务引用Web Service References 可以注册 Web 服务，以便通过创建从客户端脚本调用对象并将其添加到的集合控件。You can register a Web service to be called from client script by creating a object and adding it to the collection of the control. ASP.NET 生成每个客户端代理对象对象中集合。ASP.NET generates a client proxy object for each object in the collection. 您可以以编程方式添加对象添加到集合在运行时注册 Web 服务。You can programmatically add objects to the collection to register Web services at run time. 有关如何访问脚本中的 Web 服务的详细信息，请参阅[公开 Web 服务添加到 ASP.NET AJAX 中的客户端脚本](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f6e9e-0acd-44c9-bf0f-0a8598fc13b8)并[从 ASP.NET AJAX 中的客户端脚本调用 Web 服务](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc06c224-f01a-45be-94af-bd71afbc07b0)。For more information about how to access Web services in script, see [Exposing Web Services to Client Script in ASP.NET AJAX](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f6e9e-0acd-44c9-bf0f-0a8598fc13b8) and [Calling Web Services from Client Script in ASP.NET AJAX](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc06c224-f01a-45be-94af-bd71afbc07b0). ## 本地化Localization 控件在呈现的页指向相应的本地化的脚本文件的任一程序集或独立的脚本文件中嵌入的脚本文件中生成的引用。The control generates references in the rendered page that point to the appropriate localized script files, which are either script files embedded in assemblies or stand-alone script files. 当属性设置为`true`，则控件检索当前区域性的本地化的资源 （例如本地化的字符串），如果它们存在。When the property is set to `true`, the control retrieves localized resources (such as localized strings) for the current culture, if they exist. 控件提供了使用本地化的资源的以下功能：The control provides the following functionality for using localized resources: - **脚本文件嵌入程序集中**。**Script files that are embedded in an assembly**. 控件将确定要发送到浏览器的区域性特定或回退区域性脚本文件。The control determines which culture-specific or fallback-culture script file to send to the browser. 这是通过使用特定于区域性的程序集属性、 与该程序集，并在浏览器的 UI 区域性打包在一起 （如果有） 的资源。It does this by using the culture-specific assembly attribute, the resources packaged with the assembly, and the UI culture of the browser (if any). - **独立的脚本文件**。**Stand-alone script files**. 控件定义的使用支持的 UI 区域性列表属性的对象。The control defines the list of UI cultures that are supported by using the property of the object. - **在调试模式下**。**In debug mode**. 控件尝试呈现包含调试信息的特定于区域性的脚本文件。The control tries to render a culture-specific script file that contains debug information. 例如，如果当前区域性设置为 en MX 页处于调试模式下，该控件将呈现脚本文件，如其名称`scriptname`.en MX.debug.js，如果该文件存在。For example, if the page is in debug mode and the current culture is set to en-MX, the control renders a script file that has a name such as `scriptname`.en-MX.debug.js, if the file exists. 如果该文件不存在，将呈现相应回退区域性的调试文件If the file does not exist, the debug file for the appropriate fallback culture is rendered 有关如何将本地化资源的详细信息，请参阅[本地化资源的组件库概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e6b15435-57c1-4dd1-9bd3-5d4c509685bb)。For more information about how to localize resources, see [Localizing Resources for Component Libraries Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e6b15435-57c1-4dd1-9bd3-5d4c509685bb). ## 错误处理Error Handling 在异步回发期间出现页面错误时引发事件。When a page error occurs during asynchronous postbacks, the event is raised. 在该服务器上的错误发送到客户端的方式取决于属性，属性，并在 Web.config 文件的自定义错误部分。The way in which errors on the server are sent to the client depends on the property, the property, and the custom errors section of the Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件的自定义错误处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e15e7ffb-e4b2-4a89-b99e-16624a5861d0)。For more information, see [Customizing Error Handling for UpdatePanel Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e15e7ffb-e4b2-4a89-b99e-16624a5861d0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用不同方案控件。The following examples show different scenarios for using the control. **启用部分页更新****Enabling Partial-Page Updates** 下面的示例演示如何使用控件以使部分页面更新。The following example shows how to use the control to enable partial-page updates. 在此示例中，和一个控件位于控件。In this example, a and a control are inside an control. 默认情况下的值属性是，和的值属性是`true`。By default, the value of the property is , and the value of the property is `true`. 因此，子控件的面板会导致异步回发。Therefore, child controls of the panel cause an asynchronous postback. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/CS/UpdatePanelExample1CS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/VB/UpdatePanelExample1VB.aspx#1)] **处理部分页面更新错误和注册脚本****Handling Partial-Page Update Errors and Registering Script** 下面的示例演示如何提供自定义错误处理在部分页面更新过程。The following example shows how to provide custom error handling during partial-page updates. 默认情况下，在部分页更新期间发生错误时被显示一个 JavaScript 消息框。By default, when an error occurs during partial-page updates, a JavaScript message box is displayed. 此示例演示如何使用自定义错误处理的处理程序，从而事件，并通过设置事件处理程序中的属性。This example demonstrates how to use custom error handling by providing a handler for the event, and by setting the property in the event handler. 您还可以设置属性来指定部分页面更新过程中发生错误时如何使用 Web.config 文件的自定义错误部分。You can also set the property to specify how the custom errors section of the Web.config file is used when an error occurs during partial-page updates. 在此示例中，默认值的使用属性。In this example, the default value of the property is used. 这意味着如果 Web.config 文件包含的元素，该元素将确定错误的显示方式。This means that if the Web.config file contains a element, that element determines how errors are displayed. 有关详细信息，请参阅[customErrors 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/288c32e2-df1f-4548-abda-de6b4cb989a6)。For more information, see [customErrors Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/288c32e2-df1f-4548-abda-de6b4cb989a6). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnAsyncPostBackError#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnAsyncPostBackError/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnAsyncPostBackError#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnAsyncPostBackError/VB/default.aspx#1)] **全球化的日期和时间显示在浏览器中****Globalizing the Date and Time That Are Displayed in the Browser** 下面的示例演示如何设置属性，以便该客户端脚本可以在浏览器中显示特定于区域性的日期和时间。The following example shows how to set the property so that client script can display a culture-specific date and time in the browser. 在示例中，`Culture`指令的特性设置为`auto`。In the example, the `Culture` attribute of the directive is set to `auto`. 因此，在当前的浏览器设置中指定的第一个语言确定区域性和 UI 区域性的页。As a result, the first language that is specified in the current browser settings determines the culture and UI culture for the page. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 为 ASP.NET 网页全球化设置区域性和 UI 区域性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76091f86-f967-4687-a40f-de87bd8cc9a0)。For more information, see [How to: Set the Culture and UI Culture for ASP.NET Web Page Globalization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76091f86-f967-4687-a40f-de87bd8cc9a0). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptGlobalization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptGlobalization/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptGlobalization#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptGlobalization/VB/default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化由内部字段控件跟踪页面、 控制和部署信息。This constructor initializes the internal fields that are used by the control to track page, control, and deployment information.

summary.span: 创建一个历史时间点，并将其添加到浏览器的历史记录堆栈中。

span.span: Creates a history point and adds it to the browser's history stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些方法重载使您能够在浏览器中定义服务器状态和 （可选） 的历史记录条目标题。These method overloads enable you to define server state, and optionally the title of the history entry in the browser. 创建历史时间点时，序列化和加密的数据附加到 Web 页的 URL，并会在浏览器的历史记录堆栈中包括一项。When you create a history point, serialized and encrypted data is appended to the URL of the Web page and an entry is included in the browser's history stack. 状态数据可用于重新创建该页面时引发的任何后续服务器导航事件。You can use the state data to re-create the page when any subsequent server navigation event is raised. 有关详细信息，请参阅[管理浏览器历史记录中使用服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bad617c8-f84c-4d94-8852-60af400810e9)。For more information, see [Managing Browser History Using Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bad617c8-f84c-4d94-8852-60af400810e9).

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddHistoryPoint (System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection state, string title);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddHistoryPoint(class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection state, string title) cil managed
Public Sub AddHistoryPoint (state As NameValueCollection, title As String)
public: void AddHistoryPoint(System::Collections::Specialized::NameValueCollection ^ state, System::String ^ title);
member this.AddHistoryPoint : System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection * string -> unit

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于创建历史时间点，如果想要保存的状态数据的多个键/值对。Use this method to create a history point when you want to save more than one key/value pair for the state data. 创建历史时间点时，序列化和加密的数据附加到 Web 页的 URL，并会在浏览器的历史记录堆栈中包括一项。When you create a history point, serialized and encrypted data is appended to the URL of the Web page and an entry is included in the browser's history stack. 如果`title`参数是`null`，Web 页的标题用作历史记录堆栈中的状态条目的标题。If the `title` parameter is `null`, the title of the Web page is used as the title of the state entry in the history stack. 状态数据可用于重新创建该页面时引发的任何后续服务器导航事件。You can use the state data to re-create the page when any subsequent server navigation event is raised. 有关详细信息，请参阅[管理浏览器历史记录中使用服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bad617c8-f84c-4d94-8852-60af400810e9)。For more information, see [Managing Browser History Using Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bad617c8-f84c-4d94-8852-60af400810e9).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将静态页面方法添加到 ASP.NET 页面，并将其标记为 Web 方法。You can add static page methods to an ASP.NET page and mark them as Web methods. 然后就像 Web 服务，但无需创建单独的.asmx 文件的一部分，可以从脚本中调用这些方法。You can then call these methods from script as if they were part of a Web service, but without creating a separate .asmx file. 若要创建 Web 方法在页面上，导入命名空间，并添加属性为每个你想要公开的静态方法。To create Web methods on a page, import the namespace and add a attribute to each static method that you want to expose. 方法必须标记为 public。The methods must be marked public. 有关详细信息，请参阅[公开 Web 服务添加到 ASP.NET AJAX 中的客户端脚本](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f6e9e-0acd-44c9-bf0f-0a8598fc13b8)。For more information, see [Exposing Web Services to Client Script in ASP.NET AJAX](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f6e9e-0acd-44c9-bf0f-0a8598fc13b8).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回`false`以下条件的任何一个条件为 true 时：The property returns `false` when any one of the following conditions is true: - 中的配置文件中，元素`retail`属性设置为`true`。In the element of the configuration file, the `retail` attribute is set to `true`. 这会替代所有其他设置。This overrides all other settings. - 属性设置为`Auto`或设置为`Inherit`，并在未启用调试`compilation`应用程序根 Web.config 文件部分。The property is set to `Auto` or to `Inherit`, and debugging is not enabled in the `compilation` section of the application-root Web.config file. - 属性设置为 `Release`。The property is set to `Release`. > [!NOTE] > `debug`指令的特性不会影响已启用 Ajax 的 ASP.NET 应用程序。The `debug` attribute of the directive does not affect Ajax-enabled ASP.NET applications. 控件使用的设置仅在 Web.config 文件，并在其和属性以确定是否呈现调试脚本。The control uses only the settings in the Web.config file and in its and properties to determine whether to render debug scripts. 有关详细信息，请参阅[调试和跟踪 Ajax 应用程序概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/92684ea0-7bb4-4a34-9203-3aa6394ce375)。For more information, see [Debugging and Tracing Ajax Applications Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/92684ea0-7bb4-4a34-9203-3aa6394ce375).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是在加载页 UI 的标记之前还是在之后加载脚本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scripts are loaded before or after markup for the page UI is loaded.

value.span: 如果在加载 UI 标记前加载脚本，则为 ；如果在加载 UI 标记后加载脚本，则为 。

span.span: if scripts are loaded before markup for the UI is loaded; if scripts are loaded after markup for the UI is loaded.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定如何在脚本相对于页 UI 的标记加载集合。The property determines how scripts in the collection are loaded relative to the markup for the page UI. 当属性是`true`、`script`元素呈现在加载页面的 UI 标记之前。When the property is `true`, a `script` element is rendered before the page's UI markup is loaded. 在此方案中，如果 UI 元素定义在脚本中，UI 完全正常运行时将其加载。In this scenario, if UI elements are defined in scripts, the UI will be fully functional when it loads. 但是，如果脚本访问为其实例尚未已创建的标记中的 UI 元素，则可能发生错误。However, if the script accesses UI elements in the markup for which instances have not yet been created, an error might occur. 若要确保访问它们之前加载了 UI 元素，处理的事件的类。To make sure that UI elements are loaded before you access them, handle the event of the class. 当属性是`false`、`script`元素呈现在呈现页面的 UI 标记后。When the property is `false`, a `script` element is rendered after the page's UI markup is rendered. 在此方案中，UI 的加载速度更快，但它可能无法完全正常运行如果定义其他 UI 元素的脚本未完成加载。In this scenario, the UI loads more quickly, but it might not be fully functional if scripts that define additional UI elements have not finished loading. 未设置此属性为`true`如果您设置到`true`已。Do not set this property to `true` if you set to `true` already.

summary.span: 当用户点击浏览器的“后退”或“前进”按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the browser's **Back** or **Forward** button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击浏览器的**回**按钮，浏览器将导航到以前查看过的 Url，其中包括包含历史时间点的状态数据的 Url。When a user clicks the browser's **Back** button, the browser navigates through previously-viewed URLs, which can include URLs that contain history-point state data. 如果在网页中的客户端代码检测到此 URL 包含历史记录状态数据，它向服务器页发出请求。If client code in the Web page detects that the URL contains history state data, it makes a request to the server page. 这相当于为回发事件，并服务器控件将引发`Navigate`事件。This acts as a postback event, and the server control raises the `Navigate` event. 可以处理此事件，并重新创建与事件使用传递的状态数据根据需要在 Web 应用程序中的页。You can handle this event and re-create the page as required in the Web application by using the state data that is passed with the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用方法注册客户端脚本数组，它是与兼容局部页面呈现，且没有任何 Microsoft Ajax 库依赖项。You use the method to register a client script array that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no Microsoft Ajax Library dependencies. 此方法注册数组时`control`表示控件内正在更新的控件。This method registers the array when `control` represents a control that is inside an control that is being updated. 若要注册一个数组，每次异步回发发生时，使用此方法的重载。To register an array every time that an asynchronous postback occurs, use the overload of this method. 如果你想要注册一个数组，其中不属于部分页面更新，如果你想要注册该数组只进行一次初始页呈现期间使用方法的类。If you want to register an array that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the array only one time during initial page rendering, use the method of the class. 可以获取对的引用对象从页属性。You can get a reference to the object from the property of the page. 方法确定是否具有在指定的名称的数组`arrayName`已注册的参数。The method determines whether an array with the name that is specified in the `arrayName` parameter is already registered. 因此，该方法将添加中指定的值如果`arrayValue`。If so, the method adds the values specified in `arrayValue`. 因为要注册的数组基于类，允许重复项。Because the array to be registered is based on the class, duplicates are allowed. 如果中的名称的已注册数组`arrayName`不存在，该数组创建中的值和`arrayValue`添加到它。If a registered array with the name in `arrayName` does not exist, the array is created and the values in `arrayValue` are added to it. 若要在数组中包含字符串文本，使用单引号 （'） 或转义的双引号引起来 (\\") 中`arrayValue`。To include string literals in the array, use single quotation marks (') or escaped double quotation marks (\\") in `arrayValue`. 请注意 JavaScript 数组中的分隔符将逗号 （，）。Note that JavaScript treats a comma (,) as a delimiter in an array. 可以通过传递一个以逗号分隔的字符串中指定多个数组值`arrayValue`。You can specify multiple array values by passing a comma-delimited string in `arrayValue`. 用逗号分隔两个项`arrayValue`等效于调用方法两次，一次为每个项。Separating two items with a comma in `arrayValue` is equivalent to calling the method two times, one time for each item.

summary.span: 将控件注册为异步回发的触发器。

span.span: Registers a control as a trigger for asynchronous postbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使您能够将 Web 服务器控件注册为触发器，以便他们执行异步回发而不是同步回发。The method enables you to register Web server controls as triggers so that they perform an asynchronous postback instead of a synchronous postback. 当的属性控件设置为`true`（这是默认值），回发内的控件控件自动注册为异步回发控件。When the property of an control is set to `true` (which is the default), postback controls inside the control are automatically registered as asynchronous postback controls. 使用方法来注册控件外部控件作为触发器的异步回发，并可能会更新面板的内容。Use the method to register controls outside an control as triggers for asynchronous postbacks, and to potentially update the content of an update panel. 若要更新以编程方式控制，请调用方法。To update an control programmatically, call the method. 您可以通过使用以声明方式添加触发器`Triggers`元素的控件。You can add the trigger declaratively by using the `Triggers` element of the control. 在 Visual Studio 中，使用设计器的**UpdatePanelTrigger 集合编辑器**对话框。In Visual Studio, use the designer's **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用方法来注册控件，以便它会导致更新控件的内容。The following example shows how to call the method to register a control so that it causes an update of an control's content. 控件不是深入了解控件。The control is not inside the control. 显示两个按钮：`Button1`和`Button2`。Two buttons are shown: `Button1` and `Button2`. `Button1` 刷新面板中，内容和`Button2`刷新整个页面。`Button1` refreshes the content of the panel, and `Button2` refreshes the whole page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl/CS/ScriptManager1CS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl/VB/ScriptManager1VB.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何调用方法来注册用户控件，以便它会导致更新控件的内容。The following example shows how to call the method to register a user control so that it causes an update of an control's content. 第一个示例显示了使用用户控件的页。The first example shows a page using the user control. 第二个示例显示了用户控件。The second example shows the user control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl/CS/ScriptManager2CS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl/VB/ScriptManager2VB.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用方法来注册页面或参与的页的一部分的客户端脚本文件中部分页面更新。You use the method to register a client script file for a page or part of a page that is participating in partial-page updates. 使用此方法注册的客户端脚本文件发送到页面时，才`control`表示控件内正在更新的控件。Client script files that are registered by using this method are sent to the page only when the `control` represents a control that is inside an control that is being updated. 若要注册的脚本文件每次异步回发发生时，使用此方法的重载。To register a script file every time that an asynchronous postback occurs, use the overload of this method. 如果你想要注册不属于部分页面更新，如果你想要注册的脚本块只进行一次初始页呈现期间使用的脚本块方法的类。If you want to register a script block that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the script block only one time during initial page rendering, use the method of the class. 可以获取对的引用对象从页属性。You can get a reference to the object from the property of the page. 方法注册客户端脚本文件的页上呈现`script`元素的开始标记包含`src`属性。The method registers a client script file on the page by rendering a `script` element whose opening tag contains a `src` attribute. `url`参数用于设置`src`属性。The `url` parameter is used to set the `src` attribute. 若要解决 Url，请使用方法。To resolve URLs, use the method. 此方法使用它调用的解析路径的 URL 的上下文。This method uses the context of the URL it is called for to resolve the path. 同时和方法呈现到浏览器的脚本文件。Both the and methods render script files to the browser. 如果已呈现具有相同的类型和键 （对于脚本文件） 或相同类型和资源名称 （对于嵌入的资源） 的脚本，则不会再次呈现该脚本。If a script with the same type and key (for a script file) or the same type and resource name (for an embedded resource) is already rendered, the script is not rendered again. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用方法来注册与局部页面呈现和的兼容的脚本没有任何 Microsoft Ajax 库依赖项。You use the method to register a script that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no Microsoft Ajax Library dependencies. 注册使用此方法注册的脚本资源时，才`control`表示控件内更新的控件。Script resources that are registered by using this method are registered only when `control` represents a control that is inside an control that is updated. 若要注册的脚本每次异步回发发生时，使用此方法的重载。To register a script every time that an asynchronous postback occurs, use the overload of this method. 如果你想要注册不属于部分页面更新，如果你想要注册的脚本块只进行一次初始页呈现期间使用的脚本块方法的类。If you want to register a script block that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the script block only one time during initial page rendering, use the method of the class. 可以获取对的引用对象从页属性。You can get a reference to the object from the property of the page. 通过 HTTP 处理程序访问程序集中的资源时使用方法。The method is used when resources from assemblies are accessed through an HTTP handler. 此方法包含的内容中的资源 URL`script`元素。This method includes the content of the resource URL in a `script` element. 同时和方法脚本文件加载到浏览器。Both the and the method load script files into the browser. 如果尚未加载具有相同的类型和键 （对于脚本文件） 或相同类型和资源名称 （对于嵌入的资源） 的脚本，则不重新加载该脚本。If a script with the same type and key (for a script file) or the same type and resource name (for an embedded resource) is already loaded, the script is not reloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将数据发送从服务器到客户端在异步回发，而不考虑接收数据的控件是否是内部过程控件。Use the method to send data from the server to the client during asynchronous postbacks, regardless of whether the control receiving the data is inside an control. 可以仅在异步回发过程中调用方法。The method can be called only during an asynchronous postback. 若要确定是否异步回发，请使用属性。To determine whether a postback is asynchronous, use the property. 此方法将调用接受一个名为参数的重载`isJsonSerialized`设置为`false`。This method invokes the overload that takes a parameter named `isJsonSerialized` that is set to `false`. 当`isJsonSerialized`参数设置为`false`，该字符串不序列化 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON)。When the `isJsonSerialized` parameter is set to `false`, the string is not serialized as JavaScript Object Notation (JSON). 有关 JSON 格式的详细信息，请参阅[JSON 简介](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=77297)Web 站点。For more information about the JSON format, see the [Introducing JSON](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=77297) Web site. 使用注册的数据项目方法可以访问客户端脚本过程中的、 和对象的事件。The data items that are registered with the method can be accessed in client script during the , , and events of the object. 在您处理这些事件，事件参数对象中传递自定义数据。When you handle these events, the custom data is passed in an event argument object. 例如，如果事件提供处理程序，自定义数据类，该类公开的属性中传递。For example, if you provide a handler for the event, the custom data is passed in the class, which exposes a property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将数据发送到两个异步回发期间页面上的控件。The following example shows how to send data to two controls on a page during an asynchronous postback. 控件不是深入了解控件。The controls are not inside an control. > [!NOTE] > 在此示例中发送的数据是仅用于说明目的。The data that is sent in this example is for illustration only. 在实际应用程序中，将使用方法以从服务器发送自定义数据。In a real-world application, you would use the method to send custom data from the server. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用方法将数据发送从服务器到客户端在异步回发，而不考虑接收数据的控件是否是内部过程控件。You use the method to send data from the server to the client during asynchronous postbacks, regardless of whether the control receiving the data is inside an control. 如果`dataItem`注册为参数`control`未序列化为 JSON，设置`isJsonSerialized`参数`false`。If the `dataItem` parameter that you register for `control` is not serialized as JSON, set the `isJsonSerialized` parameter to `false`. 这样可以避免需要使用用于发送到客户端每个字符串的函数。This avoids the need to use the function for each string that is sent to the client. 有关 JSON 格式的详细信息，请参阅[JSON 简介](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=77297)Web 站点。For more information about the JSON format, see the [Introducing JSON](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=77297) Web site. 可以仅在异步回发过程中调用方法。The method can be called only during an asynchronous postback. 若要确定是否异步回发，请使用属性。To determine whether a postback is asynchronous, use the property. 使用注册的数据项目方法可以访问客户端脚本过程中的、 和对象的事件。The data items that are registered by using the method can be accessed in client script during the , , and events of the object. 在您处理这些事件，事件参数对象中传递自定义数据。When you handle these events, the custom data is passed in an event argument object. 例如，如果事件提供处理程序，自定义数据类，该类公开的属性中传递。For example, if you provide a handler for the event, the custom data is passed in the class, which exposes a property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将数据发送到两个异步回发期间页面上的控件。The following example shows how to send data to two controls on a page during an asynchronous postback. 控件不是深入了解控件。The controls are not inside an control. 此示例演示的重载不采用`isJsonSerialized`参数。This example shows the overload that does not take the `isJsonSerialized` parameter. 否则，用于检索对象的属性的过程是相同的像未使用该重载。Otherwise, the procedure for retrieving the property of the object is the same as if you did not use that overload. > [!NOTE] > 在此示例中发送的数据是仅用于说明目的。The data that is sent in this example is for illustration only. 在实际应用程序中，将使用方法以从服务器发送自定义数据。In a real-world application, you would use the method to send custom data from the server. 例如，可以使用的数据项目发送有关是否要隐藏或显示不是内部的元素的客户端信息控件。For example, you could use the data item to send information about whether to hide or show client elements that are not inside an control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来注册`dispose`内的控件的脚本控件。Use the method to register `dispose` scripts for controls that are inside an control. 异步回发期间控件可以更新、 删除，或创建。During asynchronous postbacks, controls can be updated, deleted, or created. 当更新或删除任何面板`dispose`内的控件注册脚本调用。When a panel is updated or deleted, any `dispose` scripts that are registered for controls that are inside the are called. 在典型的页面开发方案中，您不需要调用方法。In typical page development scenarios, you do not have to call the method. 方法旨在由控件开发人员若要注册脚本或创建继承的控件用于接口。The method is intended for use by control developers to register script or create controls that inherit from the interface. 例如，可以使用`dispose`编写脚本来使用合成开发客户端控件时。For example, you might use a `dispose` script if you develop a client control by using composition. 在您的控制，您实现和呈现单个控件。In your control, you implement and render individual controls. 你注册`dispose`不对应于定义的客户端组件如任何项的方法`Sys.TextBox`。You register the `dispose` method of any item that does not correspond to a defined client component such as `Sys.TextBox`. 如果自定义控件进行组合与 Microsoft Ajax Library 中的客户端组件相对应的元素，不需要注册`dispose`脚本，因为`dispose`自动调用。If your custom control composes elements that correspond to client components in the Microsoft Ajax Library, you do not have to register a `dispose` script, because `dispose` is called automatically. 因此，使用客户端组件是 Microsoft Ajax 库的一部分，且必须在不再使用某个组件时释放资源的方法。Therefore, use the method for client components that are part of the Microsoft Ajax Library and that have to free resources when a component is no longer used. 方法可以多次调用控件。The method can be called multiple times for a control. 聚合多个脚本。Multiple scripts are aggregated. 释放脚本的顺序与在其中注册脚本的顺序相匹配。The order of disposing scripts matches the order in which the scripts were registered. 如果你注册`dispose`控件不在脚本控件，将引发异常。If you register a `dispose` script for a control that is not in an control, an exception is thrown. `dispose`之间调用脚本和类的事件。The `dispose` script is called between the and events of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用方法来注册与局部页面呈现和的兼容的控件的自定义 (expando) 属性没有任何 Microsoft Ajax 库依赖项。You use the method to register a custom (expando) property for a control that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no Microsoft Ajax Library dependencies. 方法注册为指定的控件的自定义特性的名称/值对。The method registers a name/value pair as a custom attribute for the specified control. 该属性是动态设置从 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 保持呈现的控件的标记的 XHTML 兼容性。The property is set dynamically from ECMAScript (JavaScript) to preserve XHTML compatibility for the rendered control's markup. 设置`encode`到`true`如果有任何动态属性的值的字符进行转义。Set `encode` to `true` if you have to escape any characters in the dynamic property's value. 如果找不到动态属性将添加到该控件，则脚本发生错误。If the control to which the dynamic property will be added is not found, a script error occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加脚本之前提交表单时，执行它可让你修改提交或取消它。The adds script that is executed before the form is submitted, which lets you modify the submission or cancel it. 您使用方法以呈现`onsubmit`语句与局部页面呈现兼容并具有无 Microsoft Ajax 库依赖项。You use the method to render an `onsubmit` statement that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no Microsoft Ajax Library dependencies. 仅当正在注册该语句控件内，将使用此方法注册的 JavaScript 代码发送到页面正在更新的控件。JavaScript code that is registered by using this method is sent to the page only when the control that is registering the statement is inside an control that is being updated. 若要向每个异步回发注册代码，请使用此方法的重载。To register code with every asynchronous postback, use the overload of this method. 如果你想要注册不属于部分页面更新，如果你想要注册该代码仅一次初始页呈现期间使用的 JavaScript 代码方法的类。If you want to register JavaScript code that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the code only one time during initial page rendering, use the method of the class. 可以获取对的引用对象从页属性。You can get a reference to the object from the property of the page. *脚本*参数的方法可以包含多个脚本命令，并使用分号 （;） 分隔。The *script* parameter of the method can contain multiple script commands that are delimited by using semicolons (;). 有关 HTML 窗体的详细信息和`onsubmit`事件，请参阅[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information about HTML forms and the `onsubmit` event, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法注册的 JavaScript 代码会导致将包括每次异步回发发生时的脚本。Registering JavaScript code with this method causes the script to be included every time that an asynchronous postback occurs. > [!NOTE] > 不删除任何先前的异步回发中的代码。Code from any earlier asynchronous postbacks is not removed. 新的异步回发将代码追加到任何现有代码，以`onsubmit`语句。New asynchronous postbacks append code to any existing code for the `onsubmit` statement. 可以注册在控件内的代码控件，以便注册该代码时，才控件更新，请使用此方法的重载。To register code for a control that is inside an control so that the code is registered only when the control is updated, use the overload of this method. 如果你想要注册不属于部分页面更新，如果你想要注册该代码仅一次初始页呈现期间使用的 JavaScript 代码方法的类。If you want to register JavaScript code that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the code only one time during initial page rendering, use the method of the class. 可以获取对的引用对象从页属性。You can get a reference to the object from the property of the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来注册内的回发控件控件作为触发器。Use the method to register postback controls inside an control as triggers. 使用此方法注册的控件更新整个页面，而不是仅更新控件的内容。Controls that are registered by using this method update a whole page instead of updating only the control's content. 注册使用此方法之外的回发控件控件没有任何影响，因为默认情况下这些控件不执行异步回发。Registering a postback control with this method outside an control has no affect because by default these controls do not perform asynchronous postbacks. 您可以通过使用以声明方式添加触发器`Triggers`元素的控件。You can add the trigger declaratively by using the `Triggers` element of the control. 在 Visual Studio 中，使用设计器的**UpdatePanelTrigger 集合编辑器**对话框。In Visual Studio, use the designer's **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用方法来注册一个启动脚本块用于处理在局部页面呈现，并兼容的页面没有任何 Microsoft Ajax 库依赖项。You use the method to register a startup script block for a page that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no Microsoft Ajax Library dependencies. 使用此方法注册的启动脚本块发送到页面中，仅当正在注册该块控件内正在更新的控件。Startup script blocks that are registered by using this method are sent to the page only when the control that is registering the block is inside an control that is being updated. 若要注册一个启动脚本块每次异步回发发生时，使用此方法的重载。To register a startup script block every time that an asynchronous postback occurs, use the overload of this method. 如果你想要注册不属于部分页面更新，如果你想要注册的脚本只进行一次初始页呈现期间使用的启动脚本方法的类。If you want to register a startup script that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the script only one time during initial page rendering, use the method of the class. 可以获取对的引用对象从页属性。You can get a reference to the object from the property of the page. 呈现的脚本块方法执行时在页面完成加载，但在页面的客户端之前`onload`引发事件。The script block that is rendered by the method executes when the page finishes loading but before the page's client `onload` event is raised. 启动脚本块都只是与以前在呈现的 ASP.NET 页的底部``标记。Startup script blocks are located at the bottom of the rendered ASP.NET page just before the `` tag. 使用注册的启动脚本块并非一定要在其中它们要注册的相同顺序输出。Startup script blocks that are registered by using are not guaranteed to be output in the same order in which they are registered. 如果启动脚本块的顺序很重要，使用对象收集单个字符串中的脚本块，然后将它们注册为单一的启动脚本的所有。If the order of the startup script blocks is important, use a object to gather the script blocks in a single string, and then register them all as a single startup script.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定是否控件应呈现调试版本还是发行版本的客户端脚本库。The property specifies whether the control should render debug or release versions of client script libraries. 此值可以通过在配置文件和页面指令中设置的值所取代。This value can be superseded by values that are set in the configuration file and in the page directive. 下表列出了此属性的有效值。The following table lists the valid values for this property. |“值”Value|定义Definition| |-----------|----------------| ||在网页中使用库的客户端脚本的调试版本时`retail`配置元素的属性设置为`false`。Debug versions of client script libraries are used in the Web page when the `retail` attribute of the configuration element is set to `false`. 否则，使用客户端脚本库的发行版本。Otherwise, the release versions of client script libraries are used.| ||当应用于的属性对象，此值等同于。When applied to the property of the object, this value is the same as .| ||除非在网页中使用库的客户端脚本的调试版本`retail`配置元素的属性设置为`true`。Debug versions of client script libraries are used in the Web page unless the `retail` attribute of the configuration element is set to `true`.| ||客户端脚本库的发布版本使用在网页中，除非`retail`配置元素的属性设置为`false`。Release versions of client script libraries are used in the Web page unless the `retail` attribute of the configuration element is set to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > `debug`指令的特性不会影响已启用 Ajax 的 ASP.NET 应用程序。The `debug` attribute of the directive does not affect Ajax-enabled ASP.NET applications. 控件使用的设置仅在 Web.config 文件，并在其和属性以确定是否呈现调试脚本。The control uses only the settings in the Web.config file and in its and properties to determine whether to render debug scripts. 有关详细信息，请参阅[调试和跟踪 Ajax 应用程序概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/92684ea0-7bb4-4a34-9203-3aa6394ce375)。For more information, see [Debugging and Tracing Ajax Applications Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/92684ea0-7bb4-4a34-9203-3aa6394ce375).

exception.span: 属性不是 值中的其中一个。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性，可指定相对的是绝对或相对于应用程序的 URL 的所有脚本块的页上。The property enables you to specify an absolute, relative, or application-relative URL for all script blocks on the page. 这包括与当前注册的自定义和第三方脚本块实例。This includes custom and third-party script blocks that are registered with the current instance. 属性通常设置为的属性以声明方式`ScriptManager`元素上的页，但它可以也在代码中设置。The property is typically set declaratively as an attribute of a `ScriptManager` element on the page, but it can be set in code also. 如果`path`属性或属性设置为对象中集合中，路径值将覆盖的值实例。If the `path` attribute or the property is set for a object in the collection, the path value overrides the value for that instance. 如果没有指定值，则控制搜索由定义的目录属性，而解析脚本引用由其或属性。If no value is specified, the control searches the directory that is defined by the property and resolves script references by their or properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 静态属性返回可以包含代表的脚本资源 （脚本重定向） 的位置的映射的集合对象。The static property returns a object that can contain a collection of mappings that represent the location of the script resource (script redirection). 可以根据名称或名称/程序集对映射的映射此集合，它可以指向对象。This collection of mappings can be mapped based on names or name/assembly pairs, and it can point to a object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将添加，可以引用的对象对象。The following examples shows how to add a object that can be referenced by a object. 将以下代码添加到 Global.asax 文件`Application_Start`事件。Add the following code to the Global.asax file in the `Application_Start` event. ```csharp ScriptResourceDefinition myScriptResDef = new ScriptResourceDefinition(); myScriptResDef.Path = "~/Scripts/jquery-1.4.2.min.js"; myScriptResDef.DebugPath = "~/Scripts/jquery-1.4.2.js"; myScriptResDef.CdnPath = "http://ajax.microsoft.com/ajax/jQuery/jquery-1.4.2.min.js"; myScriptResDef.CdnDebugPath = "http://ajax.microsoft.com/ajax/jQuery/jquery-1.4.2.js"; ScriptManager.ScriptResourceMapping.AddDefinition("jquery", null, myScriptResDef); ``` ```vb Dim myScriptResDef As New ScriptResourceDefinition() myScriptResDef.Path = "~/Scripts/jquery-1.4.2.min.js" myScriptResDef.DebugPath = "~/Scripts/jquery-1.4.2.js" myScriptResDef.CdnPath = "http://ajax.microsoft.com/ajax/jQuery/jquery-1.4.2.min.js" myScriptResDef.CdnDebugPath = "http://ajax.microsoft.com/ajax/jQuery/jquery-1.4.2.js" ScriptManager.ScriptResourceMapping.AddDefinition("jquery", Nothing, myScriptResDef) ``` 在 ASP.NET Web 窗体页 （.aspx 文件） 的标记，添加以下标记内的`form`元素之前的任何元素或使用 jQuery 脚本的代码。In the markup for an ASP.NET Web Forms page (.aspx file), add the following markup inside the `form` element and before any elements or code that uses jQuery script. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的对象是一系列对象，其中每个表示脚本文件。The object that is returned by this property is a collection of objects, each of which represents a script file. 该集合包括对 ASP.NET Ajax 功能所需的所有脚本文件和自定义脚本文件的引用。The collection includes references to all the script files that ASP.NET needs for Ajax functionality, and to custom script files. 可以在中定义自定义脚本文件来呈现控件或关联控件。Custom script files to render can be defined in the control or in an associated control. 您可以通过添加脚本文件添加到标记中的集合`asp:ScriptReference`元素与`Scripts`节点内的`asp:ScriptManager`元素在页面上，如下面的示例中所示。You can add script files to the collection in markup by adding `asp:ScriptReference` elements to a `Scripts` node inside the `asp:ScriptManager` element on the page, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 您还可以添加对象传递给以编程方式使用集合方法的类。You can also add a object to the collection programmatically by using the method of the class. 控件在控件的过程注册脚本文件事件。The control registers script files during the control's event. 集合不包含核心 Microsoft Ajax Library 脚本。The collection does not contain the core Microsoft Ajax Library scripts. 核心库中的脚本可以自动呈现它们不需要使用注册控件。The scripts in the core library are rendered automatically; they do not have to be registered with the control. 但是，如果你想要重写 core 脚本或任何控制脚本并将不同版本的脚本，则可以添加到你的版本集合。However, if you want to override a core script or any control script and substitute a different version of the script, you can add your version to the collection.
